title: Colors 2024

metadata.description: Learn about Colors 2024 with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Every year the
Pantone Color Institute
evaluates the colors shown by fashion designers at the New York Fashion Week.
This information is used to create The Pantone Color of the Year and the 
Pantone Fashion Color Report with the top fashion colors for the year:
Color of the Year 2024
Peach Fuzz
HEX: #FFBE98
PANTONE 13-1023
Spring / Summer Colors 2024
Rooibos Tea
HEX: #AE4B38
PANTONE 18-1335
Orangeade
HEX: #E75936
PANTONE 17-1461
Watercress
HEX: #D708C66
PANTONE 17-0220
Desert Flower
HEX: #FF9A90
PANTONE 15-1435
Chambray Blue
HEX: #A4B9DA
PANTONE 15-4030
Pastel Lilac
HEX: #BEB2D5
PANTONE 14-3812
Marlin
HEX: #505C84
PANTONE 18-3932
Lemon Drop
HEX: #F8D974
PANTONE 12-0736
Mint
HEX: #00AB78
PANTONE 16-5938
Capri
HEX: #42BDCB
PANTONE 15-4722
Autum / Winter Colors 2024/2025
Tomato Cream
HEX: #C57644
PANTONE 16-1348
Golden Palm
HEX: #AF8D1F
PANTONE 17-0839
Scarlet Smile
HEX: #9F2436
PANTONE 19-1558
Aventurine
HEX: #005348
PANTONE 19-5421
Red Orange
HEX: #EF5327
PANTONE 17-1464
Fern
HEX: #999E62
PANTONE 16-0430
Italian Plum
HEX: #51354A
PANTONE 19-2514
Moonstruck
HEX: #C2BEB6
PANTONE 14-4500
Winter Sky
HEX: #A6C0CD
PANTONE 14-4307
Lucent White
HEX: #F4F7FF
PANTONE 19-3810
Download the Libraries
Downloads
The Fashion Color libraries can be downloaded from:
W3.CSS Fashion Colors

★
+1

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers Colors 2024 concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Colors 2024 effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Colors 2024 and how to apply it in your projects.
